text: @maddow I’m no lawyer, but wonder how long it will be before someone loses a family member or loved one & turns around & sues the state of #Arkansas & @AsaHutchinson for bazillions due to his negligence & position on stopping cities & counties from issuing  #lockdown in areas? #COVID19
